verses.text: Furthermore, Ahithophel said \w to|strong="H1732"\w* Absalom, “\w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* choose \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* thousand \w men|strong="H8147"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w out|strong="H8147"\w* \w tonight|strong="H3915"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w pursuit|strong="H7291"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w attack|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w while|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w weak|strong="H7504"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w weary|strong="H3023"\w*; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* throw \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* panic, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w*; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w only|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*

\w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bride \w returning|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* husband. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w only|strong="H1245"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*;\f + \fr 17:3 \ft LXX; see also DSS; MT and bring all the people back to you. When everyone returns except the man you seek,\f* \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H7725"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.”

\w This|strong="H1697"\w* \w proposal|strong="H1697"\w* \w seemed|strong="H5869"\w* \w good|strong="H3474"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Absalom \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* Absalom \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Summon|strong="H7121"\w* \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* Archite \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w too|strong="H1571"\w* \w has|strong="H4100"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w say|strong="H6310"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* \w came|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Absalom, \w who|strong="H2088"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, “Ahithophel \w has|strong="H1697"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w proposal|strong="H1697"\w*. \w Should|strong="H6213"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w carry|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H6213"\w*? If \w not|strong="H6213"\w*, \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w*?”

\w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* replied, “\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w time|strong="H6471"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w advice|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H6098"\w* Ahithophel \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sound|strong="H2896"\w*.”

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* continued, “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* father \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w fierce|strong="H4751"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wild|strong="H7704"\w* \w bear|strong="H1677"\w* \w robbed|strong="H7909"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w her|strong="H3045"\w* \w cubs|strong="H7909"\w*. \w Moreover|strong="H3588"\w*, \w your|strong="H3045"\w* father \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1368"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spend|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w night|strong="H3885"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Surely|strong="H8085"\w* \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w hiding|strong="H2244"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cave \w or|strong="H8085"\w* \w some|strong="H5971"\w* other location. \w If|strong="H2009"\w* \w some|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w first|strong="H8462"\w*,\f + \fr 17:9 \ft Or If he should attack your troops first\f* whoever \w hears|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* say, ‘\w There|strong="H2009"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4046"\w* \w among|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w follow|strong="H1961"\w* Absalom.’

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* most \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* soldier \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w melt|strong="H4549"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* fear, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w knows|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w man|strong="H1368"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w Instead|strong="H3588"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w advise|strong="H3289"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* Beersheba—\w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w like|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seashore|strong="H3220"\w*—\w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5921"\w* \w lead|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w battle|strong="H7128"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5307"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* attack David \w wherever|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* descend \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ground|strong="H4725"\w*. \w And|strong="H8033"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w remain|strong="H3498"\w*.

\w If|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* retreats \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H5375"\w* \w ropes|strong="H2256"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w drag|strong="H5498"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* down \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w valley|strong="H5158"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pebble \w can|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H6680"\w* Absalom \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H7451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* said, “\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w advice|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Archite \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Ahithophel.” \w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* purposed \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w thwart|strong="H6565"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Ahithophel \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w order|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H7451"\w* \w disaster|strong="H7451"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* Absalom. Hushai’s Warning Saves David (Psalms 55:1–23)

\w So|strong="H2063"\w* \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* told \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* Abiathar, \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, “\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w what|strong="H2063"\w* Ahithophel \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w advised|strong="H3289"\w* Absalom \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w what|strong="H2063"\w* \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w advised|strong="H3289"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4120"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, ‘\w Do|strong="H4057"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w spend|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fords|strong="H6160"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w but|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* sure \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w cross|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w*. \w Otherwise|strong="H6435"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w swallowed|strong="H1104"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w*.’”

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* Ahimaaz \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w staying|strong="H5975"\w* \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w En-rogel|strong="H5883"\w*, \w where|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* \w girl|strong="H8198"\w* \w would|strong="H1980"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* pass \w along|strong="H1980"\w* information \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* turn \w would|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w inform|strong="H5046"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* dared \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* entering \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w did|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H3381"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* Absalom. \w So|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w left|strong="H3381"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4120"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w came|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* Bahurim. \w He|strong="H8033"\w* had \w a|strong="H3068"\w* well \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* climbed \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w*’s wife \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covering|strong="H4539"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w well|strong="H3045"\w*, scattering \w grain|strong="H7383"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w nobody|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H1697"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7725"\w* Absalom’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w came|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w woman|strong="H1004"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w asked|strong="H1245"\w*, “\w Where|strong="H1004"\w* \w are|strong="H5650"\w* Ahimaaz \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*?” “\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w brook|strong="H4323"\w*,” \w she|strong="H3808"\w* replied. \w The|strong="H7725"\w* \w men|strong="H5650"\w* \w searched|strong="H1245"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H5650"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w After|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* men \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w gone|strong="H5927"\w*, Ahimaaz \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Jonathan \w climbed|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* well \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w inform|strong="H5046"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, saying, “\w Get|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w cross|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w river|strong="H3588"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w once|strong="H5927"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Ahithophel \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w given|strong="H3289"\w* \w this|strong="H3602"\w* \w advice|strong="H3289"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*. \w By|strong="H5674"\w* \w daybreak|strong="H1242"\w*, \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H5737"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.
